name: Fish Monkfish
notes: Use Piscatoris teleport to get there quickly

notes: Requires 90 Woodcutting and completion of Mourning's End Part II

name: Kill Vorkath
notes: Bring Ranged gear and Super Antifire potions

name: Catch Chinchompas
notes: Red chinchompas in Feldip Hills or black chinchompas in wilderness

name: Make Cannonballs
notes: Requires Dwarf Cannon quest and steel bars

name: Cook Karambwan
notes: One-tick cooking method for faster XP

name: Farm Herbs
notes: Check all herb patches with magic secateurs

name: Kill Zulrah
notes: Bring switches for multiple combat styles

name: Blast Furnace
notes: Great for smithing XP and making bars
